title: Numeric Rating Scale (0-10) Schema
description:
Create Database Schema for Numeric Pain Rating Scale (NPRS) Assessments

Design and implement a database schema to store patient pain assessments using the Numeric Pain Rating Scale (0-10), including metadata about when and by whom each assessment was conducted.

Requirements:
- Create a table/model for pain assessment records with the following fields:
  - Pain score (integer, 0-10 range validation)
  - Timestamp of assessment (datetime, required)
  - Assessor information (staff/clinician identifier)
  - Patient identifier (foreign key/reference)
  - Optional notes/comments field for additional context
- Add constraints to ensure pain score is within valid range (0-10)
- Index timestamp field for efficient querying of historical data
- Include created_at and updated_at audit fields
- Consider adding assessment method field (patient-reported vs clinician-observed)
- Define relationships to existing patient and user/staff tables
- Add unique constraint or logic to prevent duplicate assessments at exact same timestamp for same patient

Edge cases to consider:
- Handle nullable assessor for patient self-reported scores
- Support multiple pain locations if needed (consider separate related table)
- Plan for assessment history/versioning if scores are correctable
